## PermanentStorage interface

Provides api for implementing permanent storage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PermanentStorage 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get(name)](./common.permanentstorage.get.md) | Gets value that was stored with 'name' from permanent storage |
|  [remove(name)](./common.permanentstorage.remove.md) | Removes value stored with 'name' from permanent storage |
|  [set(name, value)](./common.permanentstorage.set.md) | Sets value that will be stored with 'name'e in permanent storage |
|  [set(name, value, expires)](./common.permanentstorage.set_1.md) | Sets value that will be stored with 'name' in permanent storage until expiration date |
